Lentil Curry

Lentil Curry

Ingredients

  1. Brown Lentils (1 cup dry)
  2. Coconut Milk (half can)
  3. Lentil Base
    • Onion (1 large)
    • Garlic (2 tbsp)
    • Ginger (2 tsp)
  4. Jerk Spices
    • Salt (1 tbsp)
    • All Spice (2 tsp)
    • Cinnamon (2 tsp)
    • Chilli Powder (or Paprika, 1 tsp)
    • Parsely (dried, 2.5 tbsp)
    • Thyme (dried, 2.5 tbsp)
  5. 2x tomatoes (blended)
  6. Parsely

Instructions

  1. Lentils
    • Soak lentils for 10-12 hrs
  2. Sautee onions, garlic and ginger until brown
  3. Add jerk spices until fragrant and almost a paste
  4. Mix blended tomatoes, half can of coconut milk and lentils
  5. Cook on high until all the water has almost evaporated
  6. If lentils are too hard, add more water and set to simmer

Modifications

  1. Lentil curries all use the same base (onions, garlic, ginger, tomatos, coconut milk). Just switch the spices for Indian / Thai lentils.
